data.title: University of Derby on LinkedIn: The University has appointed Stephen Dudderidge to the new role of Chief…
data.meta_description: The University has appointed Stephen Dudderidge to the new role of Chief Operating Officer to drive forward the University’s strategic ambitions and future…
data.text:
As Senior Advisor to the President at the American Council on Education, I am pleased to publish regular thought pieces on the ACE website that offer assistance and advice to institutional presidents. To view these prior posts: www.highered.today.org. This current thought piece focuses on how presidents can support an institutional environment where faculty, staff, and students thrive and say "this institution is exactly where I belong". Here is the link to the post: Beyond Crisis Management: How Presidents Can Create a Campus Where Everyone Belongs https://lnkd.in/dEdHj3n3

Learn about the journey of Quinn Basta, a junior finance major, who exemplifies the right amount of balance between academic excellence and active campus involvement. From revitalizing the Portfolio Management Team to serving as student trustee on the University of Illinois Board of Trustees, Quinn's dedication to leadership and student engagement is remarkable. Read Quinn's story of passion, perseverance, and the drive to make a difference on campus and beyond: https://lnkd.in/g35YSdYv

Want More Enrollments? Learn how Grand Canyon University became the largest private university in the world. Discover the Three Key Elements: Money, Marketing, & Management Join the experts who transformed Grand Canyon University into the world's largest private university. We're masters at discovering untapped funding opportunities for educational institutions. "Our scar tissue is more valuable than our success." - MKC With a history of learning from every mistake in managing a regionally accredited institution, we know what it takes to succeed through failure. "I don’t know everything, but I know someone who does!" - MKC Being a University President or Director of Enrollment is challenging. It requires a unique skill set, which we refer to as: "Pivot Parlay" Are you leading a regionally accredited institution and interested in "Strategic Dreaming"? Let's connect, free of charge. Contact MKC at mkc@mclifford.com or call 760-801-5021. www.mkc@advisor.com #enrollment Grand Canyon University Council for Christian Colleges & Universities (CCCU) #president #leads #growth #university #education #onlineeducation #leadership https://lnkd.in/gayRcGdz
